          <title>
            <string language="fr">Positions des roches en Islande</string>
            <string language="en">Positions of rocks in Iceland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Positionen der Felsen in Island</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Posições das rochas em Islândia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Posizioni delle roccie in Islanda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέσεις των βράχων στην Ισλανδία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Posiciones de rocas en Islandia</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette carte montre les emplacements de deux types différents de roches et des zones avec un activité volcanique en Islande.</string>
            <string language="en">This map shows the locations of two different types of rocks and the areas with volcanic activity in Iceland.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karte zeigt die Standorte von zwei 
unterschiedlichen Typen Felsen und von Bereichen mit vulkanischer 
Aktivität in Island.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este mapa mostra as posições de dois tipos 
diferentes de rochas e das áreas com atividade vulcânica em 
Islândia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma mostra le posizioni di due tipi 
differenti di roccie e delle zone con attività vulcanica in Islanda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο χάρτης εμφανίζει τις θέσεις δύο διαφορετικών
τύπων βράχων και τις περιοχές με την ηφαιστειακή δραστηριότητα 
στην Ισλανδία.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta correspondencia muestra las localizaciones de
dos diversos tipos de rocas y de las áreas con actividad volcánica 
en Islandia.</string>
